page.title: 12CLUBS AND SOCIETYS
page.content: THERE ARE MANY CLUBS AND SOCIETYS WHERE I LIVE. THE CHURCH HAS MANY CLUBS, BADMINTON, PLAY GROUP, BROWNIES AND A BRIDGE CLUB. FURTHER UP THE ROAD THERE IS A SQUASH CLUB AND ABOUT A MILE AWAY THERE IS WYNDLEY LEISURE CENTRE. MY DAD IS IN A SNOOKER CLUB. IT IS IN MINWORTH. YOU PAY 50p FOR 50 MINUTES. HE IS ALSO IN A FISHING CLUB AT A PUB CALLED THE PLOUGH AND HARROW. MY MUM IS IN A DANCE SCHOOL CALLED NOVELLI SCHOOL OF DANCE. SHE IS ON GRADE 4 AND DOING VERY WELL. SHE HAS TAKEN EXAMS AND BEEN IN A FEW SHOWS. SHE IS ALSO IN A KEEP FIT CLUB. SHE GOES THERE TO TRY AND GET SLIMMER. MY BROTHER IS IN A GOLF CLUB. HE GOES TO PLAY AT THE COURSE IN BOLDMERE. I AM IN A MOTORBIKE CLUB. THEY ARE CALLED THE DRUIDS. IT IS A MOTORBIKE SCRAMBLING CLUB.
